definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: liu2 dong4 xing4 da4 sha1 mo4

sentences.english: Flow property testing should be part of routine pre-engineering work, he says.
sentences.chinese: 流動性是日常先期工程工作的一部分，他說。

sentences.english: I say that because it gives tremendous liquidity to the markets.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣說是因爲它給市場帶來的巨大的流動性。

sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.
sentences.chinese: 員工流動賦予科技產業流動性，週轉性和能量。

sentences.english: Suitable for packing materials with fine flowability.
sentences.chinese: 適用於流動性好的顆粒料的包裝。

sentences.english: The liquidity of subprime-mortgage securities was at the heart of the credit crisis.
sentences.chinese: 次級抵押證券的流動性，處於信貸危機的漩渦中心。

sentences.english: But as important in China is the impact of liquidity.
sentences.chinese: 但在中國，流動性的影響同樣重要。

sentences.english: Wu said, the market liquidity of asset liquidity is all about.
sentences.chinese: 吳曉靈表示，市場流動性是資產變現能力的體現。

sentences.english: But one of the side effects of all that liquidity in the markets was inflation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，市場流動性所帶來的另一個效果就是通貨膨脹。

sentences.english: Allover strategic seaming for uncompromised mobility.
sentences.chinese: 全面性戰略接縫無與倫比的流動性。

sentences.english: Liquidity in banned shares is down and bid-ask spreads are up.
sentences.chinese: 被禁止賣空的股票流動性下降，買賣差價增加。

sentences.english: Addition of LDPE can improve the flow behavior of N6.
sentences.chinese: LDPE的加入可以改進N6均聚物的流動性能。

sentences.english: Forcing too much liquidity on banks stifles credit.
sentences.chinese: 強制銀行流動性過多，將會遏制銀行信貸。

sentences.english: The stability and fluidity for suspension type coating of seeds have heen discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了懸浮劑型種衣劑的懸浮穩定性和流動性。

sentences.english: We increase the liquidity of the secondary bond market.
sentences.chinese: 我們增加了二級債券市場的流動性。

sentences.english: Into the current liquidity crisis meeting of the bank treasurers Subject.
sentences.chinese: 流動性危機成爲本屆銀行司庫會議的主題詞。

sentences.english: Too much liquidity in any market can lead to speculation.
sentences.chinese: 過多流動性在任何市場都可能導致投機行爲。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
